data: RESP Exacerbation of COPD (Module)
Medications
Use antimicrobials if 2 or more of the following are present:   - Increased dyspnea    - Increased sputum volume   - Increased sputum purulence  Recommended duration of therapy is 5-7 days
Anti-infective doses may require adjustment for GFR less than 30 mL/min. Please consult a clinical pharmacist.
Reference table for Anti-Infective Treatment Based On Clinical Status
Repeat prescriptions of the same antibiotic should be avoided within a three-month interval
